com.rift.coad.lib.deployment.webservice
Class WebServiceManager

java.lang.Object
  com.rift.coad.lib.deployment.webservice.WebServiceManager

public class WebServiceManager
extends java.lang.Object

The web service manager. Responsible for controlling the loading and unloading of web services.

          This class wrapps the web service list and supplies thread safe access to the references held within.
